Headline: Purple Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Purple Line trains are running with delays at Linden due to signal problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line trains are running with delays at Linden due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute near 71st/Dorchester
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses temp. rerouted WB: 71st, Stony Island, 70th, Dorchester & 71st; EB: 71st, Dorchester, 73rd, Stony Island & 71st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 71st/Dorchester.

Westbound buses will operate via 71st, Stony Island, 70th, Dorchester and 71st.

Eastbound buses will operate via 71st, Dorchester, 73rd, Stony Island and 71st.

Allow extra travel time.
